name: satellite.js

scripts.build: rimraf lib dist && npm run transpile && npm run dist
scripts.dist: npm run dist:es && npm run dist:umd:dev && npm run dist:umd:prod
scripts.dist:umd:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dist:umd && node --require @babel/register commands/add-copyright.js 'dist/**/satellite.js'
scripts.dist:umd:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run dist:umd && node --require @babel/register commands/add-copyright.js 'dist/**/satellite.min.js'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run lint:test && npm test && npm run build
scripts.transpile: babel src --out-dir lib --ignore indexUmd.js && node --require @babel/register commands/add-copyright.js 'lib/**/*.js'
